name: KITS LÔANT COLLECTION
description:
Customize your kit!

You can choose three Eau de Perfumes of the Lôant Collection and create your kit for mixing them.

Tip: You can share Lôant Collection with your partner and create different perfumes for each.

<b> 150ml 5.1 FL.OZ. 
(50ml + 50ml + 50ml)
FREE SHIPPING WORLDWIDE

name: DISCOVERY KIT
description:
This "KIT" contains:

- LÔJAZZ 3ml 0.1 FL.OZ. EDP
- LÔROSE 3ml 0.1 FL.OZ. EDP
- LÔBITT 3ml 0.1 FL.OZ. EDP
- LÔANT* 3ml 0.1 FL.OZ. EDP
- LÔVANN 3ml 0.1 FL.OZ. EDP
- LÔTREE 3ml 0.1 FL.OZ. EDP
- LÔMUSK 3ml 0.1 FL.OZ. EDP

<b> 21ml 0.7 FL.OZ. 
(7 x 3ml 0.1 FL.OZ.)
FREE SHIPPING (IN SPAIN)

name: LÔANT
description:
Lôant [loænt] connector created with white musk, amber, ambroxan, nutmeg and cashmeran.

It is classified as the heart notes of the LÔANT COLLECTION. 

It can be used alone or combined with the other notes of the collection. 

Olfactory family: MOLECULAR CONNECTOR

<b> 50ml. 1.7 FL.OZ. 
FREE SHIPPING WORLDWIDE

name: LÔTREE
description:
Lôtree [lotri] small emerald jewel made with Sri-Lankan sandalwood, cedarwood, oakmoss, bamboo cane and Arabic woods.

It is classified as the fond notes of the LÔANT COLLECTION.

It can be used alone or combined with the other notes of the collection. 

Olfactory family: WOODY

<b> 50ml. 1.7 FL.OZ. 
FREE SHIPPING WORLDWIDE

name: LÔROSE
description:
Lôrose [loroz] multi-floral fragrance that combines Indian and Bulgarian rose, Egyptian geranium and Indonesian patchouli.

It is classified as the top notes of the LÔANT COLLECTION.

It can be used alone or combined with the other notes of the collection. 

Olfactory family: FLORAL

<b> 50ml. 1.7 FL.OZ. 
FREE SHIPPING WORLDWIDE

name: LÔVANN
description:
Lôvann [lovæn] triplet of vanillas: Bourbon, Madagascar and Tahiti, Mediterranean honey, Girona apple and coconut milk. 

It is classified as the fond notes of the LÔANT COLLECTION. 

It can be used alone or combined with the other notes of the collection. 

Olfactory family: GOURMAND

<b> 50ml. 1.7 FL.OZ. 
FREE SHIPPING WORLDWIDE

name: LÔBITT
description:
Lôbitt [lobit] fresh citrus fruits proposal made with Sicilian bergamot, mandarin, Amalfi lemon, Sevillian orange and neroli.

It is classified as the top notes of the LÔANT COLLECTION. 

It can be used alone or combined with the other notes of the collection. 

Olfactory family: CITRUS

<b> 50ml. 1.7 FL.OZ. 
FREE SHIPPING WORLDWIDE

name: LÔMUSK
description:
Lômusk [lomʌsk] musk cocktail with a touch of wild silk, ambergris and sweet and metalic notes. 

It is classified as the fond notes of the LÔANT COLLECTION. 

It can be used alone or combined with the other notes of the collection. 

Olfactory family: ORIENTAL

<b> 50ml. 1.7 FL.OZ. 
FREE SHIPPING WORLDWIDE

name: LÔJAZZ
description:
Lôjazz [loʒæz] sweet eau de parfum created from jasmine sambac, violet petals, magnolia and Tunisian orange blossom.

It is classified as the top notes of the LÔANT COLLECTION.  

It can be used alone or combined with the other notes of the collection. 

Olfactory family: FLORAL

<b> 50ml. 1.7 FL.OZ. 
FREE SHIPPING WORLDWIDE

name: EAU DE PARFUM SANTI BURGAS
description:
Top notes: Sicilian bergamot, mandarin, orange, thyme.

Medium notes: leather, violet petals, Egyptian geranium.

Fond notes: amber, Indonesian patchouli, benzoin, Virginian cedarwood and Madagascar absolute vanilla.

<b> 100ml. 3.3 FL.OZ. 
FREE SHIPPING WORLDWIDE

name: AW12-009
description:
Long sleeve shirt made of natural cotton & polyester.

- Colour: Grey check 
- "SLIM SHIRT"
- Fabric: 50% natural cotton & 50% Polyester.
- Brand logo embroided on the back yoke.
- Contrast with poplin 100% cotton in res on cuffs and on the under collar band.
- Washed for a soft and more comfortable feeling
- One pocket on the chest
- The back is a little bit longer than the front
- Designed in Girona (Catalonia)


Ref.: AW12-009

NON-IRON!

<b> FREE SHIPPING WORLDWIDE
